name: Tongue Disarm
summary: You lash out with your tongue to disarm your foe.
description:
You lash out with your tongue to disarm your foe. You attempt to Disarm a creature within 10 feet, ignoring the requirement that you must have at least one hand free.Traits

Lizardfolk: These reptilian humanoids, also known as iruxi, are extremely adaptable and patient.
